Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>「霧の奥にある夢の続きが見たい」<White>…… どういう意味でしょうか？
Entry.EnglishText: "<Cyan>I want to see what comes after the dream in the depths of the mist<White>..." I wonder what that means?

Entry.JapaneseText: 単なる<Yellow>合言葉<White>さ。 深い意味なんてないだろ？
Entry.EnglishText: It's just a <Yellow>password<White>. Would it really have any deep meaning behind it?

Entry.JapaneseText: 霧の奥の夢…… 幻想的な響きね。
Entry.EnglishText: A dream in the depths of the mist... It has an air of whimsy to it...

Entry.JapaneseText: モヤモヤしてて、 まどろっこしくないか？
Entry.EnglishText: But wouldn't it be annoying if everything was all misty?
You sure know how to kill the mood...
